/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on awards to dependents of incompetent Veterans, including
apportionment to dependents of non-institutionalized, incompetent Veterans
awards to dependents of institutionalized, incompetent Veterans
apportioning Veterans Pension when the Veteran is incompetent and institutionalized
award adjustments for an incompetent Veteran with an estranged spouse
, and
apportioning an award of pension to a dependent parent
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F - Awards Specific to Institutionalized, Incompetent Veterans
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F
